question: What's your stance on default to remote-first for our team? Choose one (or answer in one sentence).

options.label: Support
options.value: I generally support default to remote-first for our team.

options.label: Oppose
options.value: I generally oppose default to remote-first for our team.

options.label: Neutral / depends
options.value: My stance on default to remote-first for our team depends on context.
